recipe.title: Hot-Smoked Salmon with Caper Cream Cheese
ingredients: 1/4 small red onion, finely chopped, plus more for serving
2 tablespoons drained capers plus more for serving
Toasted spelt bread, dill sprigs, and lemon wedges (for serving)
instructions: Mix cream cheese, yogurt, lemon juice, 1/4 onion, and 2 tablespoons capers in a medium bowl; season with salt and pepper. Serve caper cream cheese with salmon, bread, dill sprigs, lemon wedges, and more capers and onion. DO AHEAD: Cream cheese can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and chill.
